roleset.name: probable

example.name: the arg
example.text: The banks that took care of their own loans wound up, long term, in a situation that-1 *PRO*-1 was likely to be better;

example.name: with CXN
example.text: In our office we are more likely to eat store bought goodies then homemade unless we really know the patient . There is only 1 patient that I will accept homemade goodies from . -LRB- He and his wife make fudge and it s amazing -RRB-

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WSJ data.
